text: The Portugal men's national field hockey team represents Portugal in men's international field hockey and is controlled by the Portuguese Hockey Federation, the governing body for field hockey in Portugal. ==Competitive record== ===European Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|EuroHockey Championship record |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! * ! ! ! |- | 1970 |colspan=8|Did not participate |- | 1974 |Fifteenth place game||16th||6||0||0||6||1||21 |- | 1978 until 2021 |colspan=8|Did not qualify |- !Total||1/18||16th||6||0||0||6||1||21 |} {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !colspan=11|EuroHockey Championships record |- !Year !Level !Position ! ! !* ! ! ! ! |- | 2005 |III||2nd||5||4||0||1||20||5|| |- | 2007 |II||7th||5||1||1||3||6||19|| |- | 2009 |III||3rd||4||2||1||1||8||11|| |- | 2011 |III||6th||4||1||1||2||15||10|| |- | 2013 |III||4th||5||2||0||3||17||14|| |- | 2015 |III||2nd||4||1||1||2||12||10|| |- | 2017 |II||8th||5||1||0||4||8||25|| |- | 2019 |III||4th||5||2||0||3||18||20|| |- | 2021 |III||colspan=8|Qualified |- !Total||colspan=2|Highest: II||37||14||4||19||104||114||– |} ===Hockey World League and FIH Series=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|Hockey World League & FIH Series record |- !Season !Position !Round ! ! ! * ! ! ! |- |rowspan=2|2012–13 |rowspan=2|33rd of 33||Round 1||4||2||1||1||13||13 |- |Round 2||5||0||0||5||2||47 |- |2014–15 |Unranked||Round 1||2||0||1||1||3||6 |- |2016–17 |Unranked||Round 1||4||1||0||3||7||20 |- |2018–19|| |Open||5||1||1||3||9||23 |- !Total||33rd||2nd Round||20||4||3||13||34||109 |} ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:European men's national field hockey teams Field hockey National team Category:Men's sport in Portugal
